sentence.Network_en: I rid myself of many superfluous belongings and habits that bothered me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把很多无用的物品都丢掉了，并且改掉了一些让我烦心的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: He was identified only by his uniform and personal belongings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的身份只是通过制服和个人财物确定了下来。

sentence.Network_en: insurance of property and personal belongings
sentence.Network_cn: 不动产和个人财物保险

entry.def: Your belongings are the things that you own, especially things that are small enough to be carried.

example.ex: I collected my belongings and left...
example.tran: 我收拾好随身物品就离开了。

example.ex: He was identified only by his uniform and personal belongings.
example.tran: 他的身份只是通过制服和个人财物确定了下来。

means.word_mean: 1. something owned; any tangible or intangible possession that is owned by someone;

auth_sentence.content: They looted all our belongings, including our savings.
auth_sentence.res_content: They looted all our belongings, including our savings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They looted all our belongings, including our savings.

auth_sentence.content: Keep your belongings in your sight at all times.
auth_sentence.res_content: Keep your belongings in your sight at all times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Keep your belongings in your sight at all times.

auth_sentence.content: They have only a few belongings and simple tools.
auth_sentence.res_content: They have only a few belongings and simple tools.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They have only a few belongings and simple tools.

sentences.en: Jewelry and lace are mostly feminine belongings.
sentences.cn: 珠宝和花边多数是女性用品。

sentences.en: I rescued my belongings from the flood.
sentences.cn: 我把财物抢救出来,免遭洪水淹没。

sentences.en: Her belongings clutter up my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 她的东西乱七八糟堆满在我臥室里。

sentences.en: I put a few personal belongings in a bag.
sentences.cn: 我把几件私人物品装进包中。
